name: Longest Subarray Sum to Zero
desc:
Given an integer array, find the longest contiguous subarray that sum up to zero.

For example:
Input: [1, 2, -3, 1, 5, -5, 6]
Output: [2, -3, 1, 5, -5]
code_ruby:
# @param arr, array of integers
# @return array of integers
def longest_subarray(arr)
end
code_lua:
-- @param arr, table of integers
-- @return table of integers
function longest_subarray(arr)
end
